I encourage you to become familiar with typical populations in your local area. This will help you get more comfortable collecting REAL data. Use the “Specific or Granular Categories” job aid for this activity.                                        

•

Review the job aid; circle the Hispanic or Latino (ethnicity) and race categories that are present in your local population.

•

On page two of the job aid, enter up to five languages you often hear when working with patients.

•

If you are unsure, ask your manager for help.

•

Once you have completed the instructions above, go to the next screen to review the situations when you should use the “Unknown or Unavailable,” or “Declined” categories.
